TopicTitle: A script or mod to automate asparigus staging

Articles.Content:
are there any mods that automate the release of asparigus staging, it seems pretty easy. Honnestly there are a lot of problems here, is asparagus realistic (maybe not but also if all variables are precalculated in a way it could be possible but dissipating gravity factors in)which it really isn't and is this  cheater mod. Look I have a lot of time I spend watching my nav ball for corrections and where I can't check the fuel levels of my staging, I feel like a mod to automate this would help.

Edited February 11, 2016 by SpaceCommunism

Not sure exactly what you want. There is a mod that helps you build asparagus staging (Auto Asparagus ), there is a mod to get your staging in the correct order (Smartstage), and Mechjeb  has the option to stage for you while in flight. Take your pick. 

Also, as far as realism of asparagus staging. The math and physics behind why it's a good option in the game is correct. However it's not realistic in the sense that because of engineering and construction difficulties, it has yet to be used in real life. 

Edited February 11, 2016 by FullMetalMachinist

I've never used it, but kOS might be what you are looking for. 

Of course ou have to program it yourself, but at least it's something.
Add-ons question moved to the add-ons subforum.
nice, thanks i will try those. Out of curiosity are there any mods on creating asparagus structures, notably fuel line placement?
The auto asparagus mod that I linked does that. I haven't tried it myself, so I don't know how well it does it, but it has that feature.

I like autoasparagus. It doesn't always work quite correctly, but I have found it considerably less frustrating to correct the mistakes it makes when asparagusing my stages automatically, than it is to correct the mistakes I make when asparagusing my stages manually.
